alert.note: Alert for Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 2:57PM CDT until March 31 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with occasional gusts over 55 mph expected. For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Henry County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. For the first Wind Advisory, until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. For the second Wind Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
